recomendedItems.name: LINEN BLAZER
recomendedItems.description: In airy lightweight linen, this blazer is classic tailoring with a warm weather twist.

recomendedItems.name: CHELSEA TEE
recomendedItems.description: Minimalist style and maximum comfort meet in this lightweight tee.

recomendedItems.name: KHAKI BOWERY CHINO PANTS
recomendedItems.description: The slim and trim Bowery is a wear-to-work pant you'll actually want to wear. A clean style in our crisp, compact cotton twill, it's perfectly polished (but also comfortable enough for hanging out after hours).

recomendedItems.name: MERINO V-NECK PULLOVER SWEATER
recomendedItems.description: A classy V-neck sweater crafted from smooth refined Merino wool. Essential for layering when changing climates.
